name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
description: Famous for its thousands of red torii gates leading up a mountain trail.

description: The world's busiest pedestrian crossing and an iconic cityscape.

description: One of the largest aquariums in the world, featuring whale sharks and coral reef tanks.

description: A whimsical museum dedicated to the works of Studio Ghibli, creators of Spirited Away.

name: Nara Deer Park
description: Home to friendly wild deer that bow for treats.

name: Tokyo Skytree
description: One of the tallest towers in the world with amazing views.

description: A quiet, dense forest at the base of Mt. Fuji.

description: An ornate shrine dedicated to Tokugawa Ieyasu.

description: Island filled with modern art museums and installations.
